title: iMac won't install game and I get an error
body:
Hi,

I am trying to download league on a new computer of mine but I cannot seem to get it to work. Once I download the game from the site I try to move it into my application folder and get an error like this:

"The operation can’t be completed because one or more required items can’t be found.
(Error code -43)"

I also cannot open the game directly from the downloaded file nor can I go into the package contents and click "Play League of Legends".

Any help is appreciated!

Thanks

replies.body: It sounds like something, maybe an antivirus, is blocking league from being installed.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team will work with you individually to see what the deal is.  See you there!
